trans-unit.source: Shell script to execute: Please type in the path to the shell script. Have a look into documentation for further information.
trans-unit.target: Shell script to execute: Please type in the path to the shell script. Have a look into documentation for further information.

trans-unit.source: Allow parallel execution: To prevent side-effects when BE users have started the script at the same, the parallel execution is disabled by default. If you're sure that no side-effects will occure you can activate this option.
trans-unit.target: Allow parallel execution: To prevent side-effects when BE users have started the script at the same, the parallel execution is disabled by default. If you're sure that no side-effects will occure you can activate this option.
